channel.title: 171st Annual General Conference

item.title: The Work Goes On
item.description:
The Work Goes On by President Gordon B. Hinckley, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 171st Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2001
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: President Gordon B. Hinckley, President of the Church
